name: Medieval Adventures
description:
A 2D platformer that takes place in the Middle Ages.

Our hero is looking for the dragon that killed his family to take revenge.

A challenging game, with a lot of twists and an endless survival mode! Live the adventure, enjoy the action, fight the zombies and blow some steam in the endless mode.

• Epic boss fights!
• Action packed non-stop fun!
• Boss battles and challenging enemies!
• Pixel art style that never gets old!
• An amazing adventure that you have to be part of!

Enjoy the pixel art in the retrostyle environment and survive the hard levels! Play this amazing retro platformer now!
